Package boundary

Class AdministratorBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.Boundary
boundary.AdministratorBoundary
public class AdministratorBoundary extends Boundary
AdministratorBoundary class represents the user interface for an administrator in the HMS system. This class handles administrator-specific interactions.
